data.caption: Piramal Finance Limited (Formerly Known As Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Limited) Has Informed Regarding Receipt Of In-Principle Approval From Stock Exchanges For Modification In The Coupon Rate Mentioned In The Information Memorandum Relating To Ncds
data.news_body: The Company has informed regarding receipt of In-principle approval from Stock Exchanges for modification in the coupon rate mentioned in the Information Memorandum relating to NCDs issued under ISINs INE516Y07014 and INE516Y07063

data.caption: Response To The Clarification Sought By BSE Limited
data.news_body: Response to the clarification sought by BSE Limited

data.caption: Clarification sought from Piramal Finance Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Piramal Finance Ltd on December 9 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://economictimes.indiatimes.com dated December 9 2025 quoting "Piramal Finance eyes Keertana for foray into gold loan segment".

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Modification In The Coupon Rate Clause Mentioned In The Information Memorandum And/Or Any Other Relevant Document(S) In Relation To Ncds Issued By The Company With The Isins INE516Y07014 And INE516Y07063.
data.news_body: The Committee of Directors (Administration Authorisation and Finance) at its meeting held today has approved the modification in the coupon rate clause mentioned in the Information Memorandum and/or any other relevant document(s) in relation to NCDs issued by the Company with the ISINs INE516Y07014 and INE516Y07063.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Piramal Finance Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 07 2025 the Equity Shares of Piramal Finance Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544597) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251104-39 dated November 04 2025.
